meanings.definition: Of or relating to quantity or amount.
meanings.sent1: The quantic measurement of the box was precise.
meanings.sent2: She bought a quantic amount of apples at the store.
meanings.sent3: The quantic price of the toy made him laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her quantic love for books filled her room.
meanings.sent5: The quantic rainfall flooded the streets.

meanings.sent1: He needed a quantic of sugar for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The quantic of water in the glass was just enough.
meanings.sent3: The quantic of laughter in the room was contagious.
meanings.sent4: His quantic of patience was running out.
meanings.sent5: The quantic of stars in the sky was mesmerizing.
